description.value:
Frequency once per day

Trigger An ally within 30 feet would be reduced to 0 HP but not immediately killed.

You give a daring yowl in the face of adversity, calling your companion back from the brink of unconsciousness.

Your ally isn't knocked out and remains at 1 Hit Point. Your ally's @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Wounded]{Wounded} condition still increases by 1 as though they had been dying and recovered.
